Bieber's vehicle, which he was riding as a passenger, crashed into a third car when the paparazzo-driven vehicle was chasing him. <br /><br /><b>"It's not injury traffic accident,</b> meaning no one was injured," the police told Hollywood Life. Bieber almost immediately jumped out of his car and left the scene with another vehicle. Beverly Hills police confirm that it was totally legal for Bieber to leave the scene since he wasn't the one driving the car.<br /><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2884931/m/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_in_car_crash_after_paparazzi_chase.jpg" /><br />Related articles<br /><a Bieber</a> and <a href="http://www.posh24.com/selena_gomez" target="_blank">Selena Gomez</a> are back together. Again.</b> The couple had a real date day this weekend and were spotted at the zoo in Los Angeles. The couple had a police escort the entire day, and posted pictures online, smiling together. None of them have commented on the reconciliaton yet.<br /><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2883225/m/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_and_selena_gomez_spent_the_day_at_a_zoo.jpg" /><br />Related Together!"</title><link>http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/bieber_and_gomez_are_dating_again_definitely_back_together</link><pubDate>Sat, 21 Jun 2014 06:02:00 GMT</pubDate><guid>http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/bieber_and_gomez_are_dating_again_definitely_back_together</guid><description><b><a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber" target="_blank">Justin Bieber</a> and <a href="http://www.posh24.com/selena_gomez" target="_blank">Selena Gomez</a> have reconciled once again.</b> Justin first hinted that they were back together after posting a romantic picture of him and the “Gome And Get It” singer on Instagram last week, and a source close to the on/off couple has now confirmed that they have decided to give their romance another chance.<br /><br /><b>“Justin and Selena are definitely full-on back together</b> at the moment,” the insider tells Us Magazine. Selena and Justin were also seen riding a motorcycle in Los Angeles earlier this week “Justin drove while Selena sat on the back holding on to him. He was incredibly sweet with her and they looked super happy and in love."<br /><br /><b>The couple began dating in 2010 and first broke up 2012</b>. Since then they have been dating and breaking up with each other several times. "Same story, every other week, every year. Now they are together again, next week they won't be,” the source adds.<br /><br /><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2863362/m/justin_bieber/bieber_and_gomez_are_dating_again_definitely_back_together.jpg" /><br />Related articles<br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_and_selena_gomez_spent_the_day_at_a_zoo"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2883225/s/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_and_selena_gomez_spent_the_day_at_a_zoo.jpg" alt="" />Justin Bieber And Selena Gomez Spent The Day At A Zoo!</a><br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_turned_to_bible_studies_after_racism_controversy"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2777379/s/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_turned_to_bible_studies_after_racism_controversy.jpg" alt="" />Justin Bieber Turned To Bible Studies After Racism Controversy!</a><br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_accaused_of_getting_two_women_pregnant"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2861781/s/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_accaused_of_getting_two_women_pregnant.jpg" alt="" />Justin Bieber Accaused Of Getting Two Women Pregnant!</a><br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_in_car_crash_after_paparazzi_chase"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2884931/s/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_in_car_crash_after_paparazzi_chase.jpg" alt="" />Justin Bieber In Car Crash After Paparazzi Chase!</a><br /></description></item><item><title>Justin Bieber Accaused Of Getting Two Women Pregnant!</title><link>http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_accaused_of_getting_two_women_pregnant</link><pubDate>Fri, 20 Jun 2014 06:02:00 GMT</pubDate><guid>http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_accaused_of_getting_two_women_pregnant</guid><description><b><a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber" target="_blank">Justin Bieber</a> is rumored to secretly have gotten at least two women</b> pregnant. A shocking new report claims that the pregnancies have been covered up by Bieber’s team in order to protect his image. <br /><br /><b>"He just expects his team to handle it," a source tells In Touch Magazine</b> and adds that the 20-year old singer’s team “rushed to cover up the pregnancies” before they leaked. According to the report, the women have been taken care of financially but have been demanded to stay out of Bieber’s life. The star’s rep has not commented on the reports yet.<br /><br /><b>The singer has been has dealing with similar scandals</b> in the past. In 2011, a girl named Mariah Yeater accused Justin of getting her pregnant and claimed he was the father of her three-year-old son Trystan. The reports were then denied by Jusin and his team. <br /><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2861781/m/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_accaused_of_getting_two_women_pregnant.jpg" /><br />Related articles<br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_and_selena_gomez_spent_the_day_at_a_zoo"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2883225/s/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_and_selena_gomez_spent_the_day_at_a_zoo.jpg" alt="" />Justin Bieber And Selena Gomez Spent The Day At A Zoo!</a><br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_turned_to_bible_studies_after_racism_controversy"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2777379/s/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_turned_to_bible_studies_after_racism_controversy.jpg" alt="" />Justin Bieber Turned To Bible Studies After Racism Controversy!</a><br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/bieber_and_gomez_are_dating_again_definitely_back_together"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2863362/s/justin_bieber/bieber_and_gomez_are_dating_again_definitely_back_together.jpg" alt="" />Bieber And Gomez Are Dating Again: "Definitely Back Together!"</a><br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_in_car_crash_after_paparazzi_chase"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2884931/s/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_in_car_crash_after_paparazzi_chase.jpg" alt="" />Justin Bieber In Car Crash After Paparazzi Chase!</a><br /></description></item><item><title>Justin Bieber Has Agreed To Anger Management Classes!</title><link>http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_has_agreed_to_anger_management_classes</link><pubDate>Sun, 15 Jun 2014 11:30:00 GMT</pubDate><guid>http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_has_agreed_to_anger_management_classes</guid><description><b><a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber" target="_blank">Justin Bieber</a> has decided to deal with his anger issues by taking</b> anger management classes. The 20-year-old singer has reportedly agreed to attend in regular teraphy as part of a plea deal following his DUI arrest in January, TMZ reports. Bieber, who gor arrested fror driving under influence in Miami earlier this year, has also been ordered to pay a fine.<br /><br /><b>According to Us Weekly, Bieber will not be placed</b> on probation. "It's a really good deal and he's happy with it," the insider tells Us. "He thinks it's fair. He just wants to put the whole bad episode behind him and move on." The singer's rep has declined to comment on the reports.<br /><br /><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2817947/m/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_has_agreed_to_anger_management_classes.jpg" /><br GMT</pubDate><guid>http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/these_two_hearthrobs_are_collaborating_on_new_song</guid><description><b>This might just be a dream come true for many of you guys out there.</b> working together in a recording studio, collaborating on a new song. It is yet unknown when their song will be released and if any other artists were involved.<br /><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2798760/m/justin_bieber/these_two_hearthrobs_are_collaborating_on_new_song.jpg" /><br />Related articles<br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/cody_simpson/cody_simpson_leaving_his_dancing_with_the_stars_rehearse"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2706748/s/cody_simpson/cody_simpson_leaving_his_dancing_with_the_stars_rehearse.jpg" alt="Cody Simpson Leaving His Dancing With The Stars Rehearse!" />Cody Simpson Leaving His Dancing With The Stars Rehearse!</a><br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/red_carpet/check_out_the_stars_at_the_radio_disney_music_awards_2014"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2738843/s/red_carpet/check_out_the_stars_at_the_radio_disney_music_awards_2014.jpg" alt="Check Out The Stars At The Radio Disney Music Awards 2014!" />Check Out The Stars At The Radio Disney Music Awards 2014!</a><br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/cody_simpson/cody_simpson_arrives_at_his_dwts_rehersal"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2727193/s/cody_simpson/cody_simpson_arrives_at_his_dwts_rehersal.jpg" alt="Cody Simpson Arrives At His DWTS Rehersal!" />Cody Simpson Arrives At His DWTS Rehersal!</a><br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/red_carpet/see_all_the_red_carpet_pics_from_radio_disney_music_awards_2013"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2141715/s/red_carpet/see_all_the_red_carpet_pics_from_radio_disney_music_awards_2013.jpg" alt="See All The Red Carpet Pics From Radio Disney Music Awards 2013! " />See All The Red Carpet Pics From Radio Disney Music Awards 2013! </a><br /></description></item><item><title>So, Are Bieber And Gomez Together Again Or Not?</title><link>http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/so_are_bieber_and_gomez_together_again_or_not</link><pubDate>Thu, 12 Jun 2014 06:01:00 GMT</pubDate><guid>http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/so_are_bieber_and_gomez_together_again_or_not</guid><description><b><a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber" target="_blank">Justin Bieber</a> has hinted that he's back together with his</b> on/off girlfriend <a href="http://www.posh24.com/selena_gomez" target="_blank">Selena Gomez</a> again. The 20-year-old singer posted a romantic black and white picture on his Instagram of them last night, with the caption "Our love is unconditional".<br /><br /><b>When the picture caused a frenzy among his fans,</b> Bieber quickly deleted it again. Selena and Justin started dating in 2010 and they have been on and off ever since. Most recently they broke up after attending the Coachella Festival together in April.<br /><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2798130/m/justin_bieber/so_are_bieber_and_gomez_together_again_or_not.jpg" /><img /></description></item><item><title>Justin Bieber Turned To Bible Studies After Racism Controversy!</title><link>http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_turned_to_bible_studies_after_racism_controversy</link><pubDate>Mon, 9 Jun 2014 06:25:00 GMT</pubDate><guid>http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_turned_to_bible_studies_after_racism_controversy</guid><description><b><a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber" target="_blank">Justin Bieber</a> has turned to religion after a controversial</b> <a href="http://www.posh24.com/video" target="_blank">video</a> of the star saying racism jokes was released online. The 20-year-old star was baptised in a bathtub in New York the other week, and has spent a week with a pastor, working with intensive Bible studies. Bieber was reportedly baptised in a friend's bathtub after attempts to find a church for the private ritual. <br /><br /><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2777379/m/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_turned_to_bible_studies_after_racism_controversy.jpg" /><br />Related articles<br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_and_selena_gomez_spent_the_day_at_a_zoo"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2883225/s/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_and_selena_gomez_spent_the_day_at_a_zoo.jpg" alt="" />Justin Bieber And Selena Gomez Spent The Day At A Zoo!</a><br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_accaused_of_getting_two_women_pregnant"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2861781/s/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_accaused_of_getting_two_women_pregnant.jpg" alt="" />Justin Bieber Accaused Of Getting Two Women Pregnant!</a><br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/bieber_and_gomez_are_dating_again_definitely_back_together"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2863362/s/justin_bieber/bieber_and_gomez_are_dating_again_definitely_back_together.jpg" alt="" />Bieber And Gomez Are Dating Again: "Definitely Back Together!"</a><br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_in_car_crash_after_paparazzi_chase"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2884931/s/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_in_car_crash_after_paparazzi_chase.jpg" alt="" />Justin Bieber In Car Crash After Paparazzi Chase!</a><br /></description></item><item><title>50 Cent Defends Justin Bieber: "He Is Still A Baby!"</title><link>http://www.posh24.com/50_cent/50_cent_defends_justin_bieber_he_is_still_a_baby</link><pubDate>Sat, 7 Jun 2014 11:30:00 GMT</pubDate><guid>http://www.posh24.com/50_cent/50_cent_defends_justin_bieber_he_is_still_a_baby</guid><description><b>Rapper <a href="http://www.posh24.com/50_cent" target="_blank">50 Cent</a> has weighed into Justin Biber's recent racism</b> scandals by sharing his opinion about the troubled pop star. Three days after footage emerged of Bieber singing a racist version of his hit "One Less Lonely Girl and joking about joining the Ku Klux Klan, the rapper defends the singer by saying he is "young and lost."<br /><br /><b>"I don’t think he’s racist, I don’t think he even</b> knows who he is at this point – he’s so young," <a href="http://www.posh24.com/50_cent" target="_blank">50 Cent</a>, whose real name is Curtis Jackson, tells The Sun. " When you see people become huge stars real early, it’s tough for them. You have to grow up with all these expectations. I think Justin’s still a baby and he’s lost."<br /><br /><b>Earlier this week, Bieber apologized for his controversial</b> behavior, saying that he made a "childish and inexcusable mistake."<br /><br /><br /><br /><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2771394/m/50_cent/50_cent_defends_justin_bieber_he_is_still_a_baby.jpg" /><br />Related articles<br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/hollywood_celebrity/are_you_born_under_the_same_zodiac_sign_as_ashley_tisdale"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/1756486/s/hollywood_celebrity/are_you_born_under_the_same_zodiac_sign_as_ashley_tisdale.jpg" alt="Ashley Tisdale's birthday is July 2nd, 1985." />Are You Born Under The Same Zodiac Sign As Ashley Tisdale?</a><br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/celebrity_friends/you_wont_believe_theyre_friends_unlikely_celeb_bffs"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2475207/s/celebrity_friends/you_wont_believe_theyre_friends_unlikely_celeb_bffs.jpg" alt="You Won't Believe They're Friends: Unlikely Celeb BFFs!" />You Won't Believe They're Friends: Unlikely Celeb BFFs!</a><br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/hot_news/50_cent_is_ok_after_being_hit_by_a_truck"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/1735977/s/hot_news/50_cent_is_ok_after_being_hit_by_a_truck.jpg" alt="50 Cent Is Ok After Being Hit By A Truck!" />50 Cent Is Ok After Being Hit By A Truck!</a><br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/hot_news/rapper_50_cent_hospitalized_but_is_it_all_for_publicity"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/1676539/s/hot_news/rapper_50_cent_hospitalized_but_is_it_all_for_publicity.jpg" alt="Is he really sick?" />Rapper, 50 Cent, Hospitalized! The 20-year old singer claims he needs to take responsibility for his actions. "At the end of the day I just need to step up and own what I did," he told The Sun.<br /><br /><b>Facing my mistakes from years ago has been one</b> of the hardest things I've ever dealt with," he continues. "But I feel now that I need to take responsibility for those mistakes and not let them linger."<br /><br /><b>Bieber's latest apology comes after an old <a href="http://www.posh24.com/video" target="_blank">video</a> of him</b> singing a racist parody of "One Less Lonley Girl and joking about joining the white supremacist group Ku Klux Klan leaked online. target="_blank">Justin Bieber</a> has made an apology for telling a racist joke on camera.</b> The 20-year old singer just released a statement on the controversial leaked <a href="http://www.posh24.com/video" target="_blank">video</a> of him saying the N-word, admitting me hade a "childish and inexcusable mistake".<br /><br /><b>“I’m very sorry,” the singer told TMZ. “I take my friendships</b> with people of all cultures very seriously and I apologize for offending or hurting anyone with my childish and inexcusable mistake. I was a kid then and I am a man now who knows my responsibility to the world and to not make that mistake again.”<br /><br /><b>Justin is blaming it on his young age in the five-year-old <a href="http://www.posh24.com/video" target="_blank">video</a>,</b> and insists he isn't racist. "As a young man, I didn’t understand the power of certain words and how they can hurt,” he explained. “I thought it was ok to repeat hurtful words and jokes, but didn’t realize at the time that it wasn’t funny and that in fact my actions were continuing the ignorance.”<br /><br /><img afraid of chainsaws?" While making the sound a chainsaw, Justin says: "Run n****r, n****r, n****r, n****r, n****r’." Justin is thought to have been 17 at the time the <a href="http://www.posh24.com/video" target="_blank">video</a> was filmed.<br /><br /><b>The Sun, who published the <a href="http://www.posh24.com/video" target="_blank">video</a> earlier today, reveals that Justin</b> knew about the footage and even tried to buy it with a considerable amount of money to keep it from surfacing online. “This <a href="http://www.posh24.com/video" target="_blank">video</a> is <a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber" target="_blank">Justin Bieber</a> and his camp’s worst nightmare. Even after the year he’s had – when he’s never been far from controversy, this tops the lot,” a source tells The Sun. GMT</pubDate><guid>http://www.posh24.com/paris_hilton/33yearold_paris_hilton_flirted_with_justin_bieber</guid><description><b><a href="http://www.posh24.com/paris_hilton" target="_blank">Paris Hilton</a> flirted with <a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber" target="_blank">Justin Bieber</a> when partying together</b> in Cannes. Hilton and Bieber are both currently in the South of France for the Film Festival, when they met at a club the other night.<br /><br /><b>Eyewitnesses say Paris, 33, sat on 20-year-old Bieber's</b> lap several times during the night. "She started dancing, sucking on a lollipop and flirting with Justin," one person from the club said about when he arrived. "She was trying to dance sexily and looked really up for party." <br /><br /><b>Paris is currently dating model <a href="http://www.posh24.com/river_viiperi" target="_blank">River Viiperi</a>, </b>and wasn't too happy about people taking photos of her when she was with Justin. Justin didn't seem to interested and focused more on getting the DJ to play his songs.<br /><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2754173/m/paris_hilton/33yearold_paris_hilton_flirted_with_justin_bieber.jpg" /><br />Related articles<br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_and_selena_gomez_spent_the_day_at_a_zoo"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2883225/s/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_and_selena_gomez_spent_the_day_at_a_zoo.jpg" alt="" />Justin Bieber And Selena Gomez Spent The Day At A Zoo!</a><br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_turned_to_bible_studies_after_racism_controversy"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2777379/s/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_turned_to_bible_studies_after_racism_controversy.jpg" alt="" />Justin Bieber Turned To Bible Studies After Racism Controversy!</a><br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_accaused_of_getting_two_women_pregnant"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2861781/s/justin_bieber/justin_bieber_accaused_of_getting_two_women_pregnant.jpg" alt="" />Justin Bieber Accaused Of Getting Two Women Pregnant!</a><br /><a href="http://www.posh24.com/justin_bieber/bieber_and_gomez_are_dating_again_definitely_back_together"><img src="http://photos.posh24.com/p/2863362/s/justin_bieber/bieber_and_gomez_are_dating_again_definitely_back_together.jpg" alt="" />Bieber And Gomez Are Dating Again: "Definitely Back Together!"</a><br /></description></item></channel></rss>
